section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The respective list window is already selected.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p: Select Details from the View menu.

section.title: Results
section.p: The list window contains for each list item the detail information as previously defined. As an example, the Document List window is shown in . Document List window sample with selected detailsFigure shows Document List window sample with selected details
As a default setting, only the names are displayed. You can change the details to be displayed (see ). Once you have defined your setting of the details, they are displayed as selected.
